import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Booking=()=>{const[bookings,setBookings]=useState([]);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({date:'',time:'',guests:1});const[editingBooking,setEditingBooking]=useState(null);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const isLoggedIn=!!localStorage.getItem('token');const userName=localStorage.getItem('userName');const userEmail=localStorage.getItem('userEmail');// Fetch bookings and user data on component mount
useEffect(()=>{const fetchBookings=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token)return;const response=await fetch('/api/bookings',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to fetch bookings');}const data=await response.json();setBookings(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching bookings:',error);setMessage('Error fetching bookings. Please try again later.');}};fetchBookings();},[]);// Handle new booking creation or update
const handleBooking=async data=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token){setMessage("You are not logged in. Please log in to access bookings.");return;// Exit the function if the token is not available
}const response=await fetch('/api/bookings',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`},body:JSON.stringify(data)});if(!response.ok){// If response is not JSON, log the response text to understand the issue
const errorMessage=await response.text();console.error('Error fetching bookings:',errorMessage);setMessage('Failed to fetch bookings. Please try again later.');return;}const data=await response.json();// Parse the JSON only if the response is okay
setBookings(data);// Fetch updated bookings after successful creation
const updatedBookings=await(await fetch('/api/bookings',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}})).json();setBookings(updatedBookings);return{success:true,message:'Booking created successfully!'};}catch(error){console.error("Booking error:",error);return{success:false,message:error.message};}};const handleEditBooking=async booking=>{setEditingBooking(booking);setFormData({date:booking.date,time:booking.time,guests:booking.party_size});};const handleUpdateBooking=async data=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token)throw new Error('You must log in to update a booking.');const response=await fetch(`/api/bookings/${editingBooking.id}`,{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`},body:JSON.stringify(data)});if(!response.ok){const errorData=await response.json();const errorMessage=errorData.error||'Failed to update booking.';throw new Error(errorMessage);}// Fetch updated bookings after successful update
const updatedBookings=await(await fetch('/api/bookings',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}})).json();setBookings(updatedBookings);setEditingBooking(null);setFormData({date:'',time:'',guests:1});return{success:true,message:'Booking updated successfully!'};}catch(error){console.error('Booking error:',error);return{success:false,message:error.message};}};const handleDeleteBooking=async id=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(!token)throw new Error('You must log in to delete a booking.');const response=await fetch(`/api/bookings/${id}`,{method:'DELETE',headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});if(!response.ok){const errorData=await response.json();const errorMessage=errorData.error||'Failed to delete booking.';throw new Error(errorMessage);}// Fetch updated bookings after successful deletion
const updatedBookings=await(await fetch('/api/bookings',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}})).json();setBookings(updatedBookings);return{success:true,message:'Booking deleted successfully!'};}catch(error){console.error('Booking error:',error);return{success:false,message:error.message};}};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setMessage('');const result=editingBooking?await handleUpdateBooking({date:formData.date,time:formData.time,party_size:formData.guests}):await handleBooking({date:formData.date,time:formData.time,party_size:formData.guests});setMessage(result.message);};const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"hero-section d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"display-4 text-white",children:"Book Your Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lead text-white",children:"Reserve your spot at Frankie's Restaurant"}),isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-success",children:["Logged in as: ",userName||userEmail||'User']}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-warning",children:"You are not logged in.
